page.title: 20 BRERETON SCHOOL STATISTICS.
page.content:
A Ravenhill Maths group thought that children in the future might like to compare their height and weight with ours. Our average menu can be found on Page 4. CLASS AGE AVERAGE AVERAGE YRS. HEIGHT WEIGHT 1 5-6 1.12m. 20.0Kg. 2 6-7 1.16m. 22.0Kg. 3 6-8 1.25m. 26.4Kg. 4 8-9 1.34m. 30.1Kg. 5 9-11 1.41m. 37.2Kg.
***************************************
Our 20 pages includes items contributed by individuals, groups and classes of pupils from the following 5 County Primary Schools. RAVENHILL and HOB HILL, Brereton. PEAR TREE and FLAXLEY, Rugeley. THE CROFT, Armitage.
